# Polymarket Trading Webapp - Copilot Instructions

This is a Next.js TypeScript project with Tailwind CSS for analyzing Polymarket traders and copy trading.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Polymarket API integration

## Key Features
- Trader leaderboard display
- Real-time trading data
- Copy trading analysis tools
- Modern, sleek UI design
